summary1: Fullstack Web Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience developing scalable web and mobile applications. Skilled in building user-friendly full-stack systems using PHP (Slim3, Laravel), JavaScript frameworks (Vue.js, React.js, Nuxt.js), and databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL. Experienced in containerization technologies like Podman, integrating UI/UX design with backend architecture to deliver user-centric solutions.
summary2: Successfully developed various systems for government, healthcare, education, and retail sectors. Proven track record in improving operational efficiency, accelerating business processes, and supporting digital transformation through API development and system integration. Strong communication skills with a demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively within teams. Currently expanding expertise in cloud infrastructure and solution architecture, aiming to transition into an IT Solution Architect role.
